entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
